fields.label: S3 bucket
fields.help: Bucket name where recordings will be stored.

fields.label: Endpoint
fields.help: Leave blank for AWS, or set the URL for S3-compatible providers.

fields.label: Region
fields.help: AWS region for the bucket (e.g. us-east-1).

fields.label: Access key ID
fields.help: From an IAM user or access key.

fields.label: Secret access key
fields.help: Shown only once when you create the key. Store it securely.
